channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Is a Copilot+ PC? Explaining Microsoft’s AI Term for Windows Laptops
item.description: Microsoft aimed to revolutionize its Windows operating system with this AI-soaked laptop certification. It’s still a work in progress.

item.title: SocialAI offers a Twitter-like diary where AI bots respond to your private posts
item.description: Are we at peak social media yet? It’s an interesting question to ponder after the launch of an iOS app offering a social media experience just for one...

item.title: 11 Best Organic Mattresses, Toppers, Bedding (2024): Nontoxic and Natural
item.description: These nontoxic beds and bedsheets are easier on the environment and your health—and they feel like a dream.

item.title: Londoners will soon see drones ferrying blood between hospitals
item.description: A joint pilot by Apian, Alphabet’s drone company Wing, and the U.K.’s NHS will see drones used to fly urgent blood samples between two hospitals in Lo...

item.title: Apple Watch Series 10 Review: Sleep Apnea Notifications and a Bigger Display
item.description: The absence of a blood oxygen sensor is a huge ding. But the Apple Watch still does everything else, and looks hella good doing it.

item.title: Announcing the final agenda for the Fintech Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: We’re incredibly excited to announce the final agenda for our dedicated Fintech Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024. It joins Space, SaaS, AI and Builder...

item.title: Workday acquires AI-powered document platform Evisort
item.description: Workday announced on Tuesday that it’s acquiring Evisort, an AI-powered contract management platform, for an undisclosed amount. In a statement, Terra...
